sentences.sContent: He conferred with Hill and the others in his office.
sentences.sCn: 他和希尔以及他办公室里的其他人进行了商议。

sentences.sContent: ...Why does the author deem it inappropriate for Harvard to confer air honorary degree on Oprah Winfrey...

remMethod.val: con(共同) ＋ fer(带来， 拿来) → 带来观点一起商议 → 商议

trans.tranOther: to discuss something with other people, so that everyone can express their opinions and decide on something
to officially give someone a title etc, especially as a reward for something they have achieved
